name: G√©n√©rer des prospects commerciaux et des e-mails de sensibilisation personnalis√©s en utilisant Jina AI et les agents OpenAI
description:
Ce flux de travail utilise des agents IA pour enrichir les donn√©es des entreprises √† partir d'Airtable. Il effectue des recherches approfondies pour trouver le meilleur d√©cideur, puis r√©dige et √©value un e-mail de sensibilisation personnalis√©, et enfin met √† jour l'enregistrement Airtable d'origine avec les nouvelles informations sur le prospect et le contenu de l'e-mail.

### üë• √Ä qui cela s'adresse-t-il ?
Ce flux de travail est id√©al pour les √©quipes de vente, les sp√©cialistes du marketing et les professionnels du d√©veloppement commercial cherchant √† automatiser leur g√©n√©ration de prospects et leur processus de sensibilisation initiale, √©conomisant du temps et augmentant la personnalisation √† grande √©chelle.

### ‚öôÔ∏è Comment cela fonctionne
Ce flux de travail commence par r√©cup√©rer des enregistrements d'entreprise non trait√©s √† partir d'une base Airtable sp√©cifi√©e. Pour chaque entreprise, il effectue une "recherche approfondie" en utilisant Jina AI pour identifier les d√©cideurs cl√©s en fonction du nom et du site Web de l'entreprise.

Ensuite, une s√©rie d'agents IA traite les informations :
1.  **Analyseur de prospects :** Un agent "Sp√©cialiste de la g√©n√©ration de prospects" analyse les r√©sultats de recherche pour s√©lectionner la personne de contact la plus appropri√©e.
2.  **Cr√©ateur de contenu d'e-mail :** Un agent "Sp√©cialiste de la cr√©ation de contenu" utilise les informations du prospect et les d√©tails de votre entreprise pour r√©diger un e-mail marketing personnalis√© et une ligne d'objet.
3.  **√âvaluateur :** Un agent "√âvaluateur d'e-mail marketing expert" examine l'e-mail g√©n√©r√© pour sa qualit√©, son ton et son efficacit√©, fournissant un score et des commentaires.

Enfin, le flux de travail met √† jour l'enregistrement d'origine dans Airtable avec le nom du prospect identifi√©, l'e-mail, le contenu de l'e-mail g√©n√©r√© et le r√©sum√© de l'√©valuation, marquant l'enregistrement comme trait√©.

### üõ†Ô∏è Comment configurer
1.  **Configuration d'Airtable :**
    * Cr√©ez une base Airtable avec une table contenant les champs suivants :
      * **Company_name** : Un champ texte pour le nom de l'entreprise du prospect (Obligatoire).
      * **Company_website** : Un champ URL pour le site Web officiel de l'entreprise (Obligatoire).
      * **Company_email** : Un champ e-mail pour un e-mail de contact g√©n√©ral pour l'entreprise (Obligatoire).
      * **Address** : Un champ texte pour l'adresse physique de l'entreprise (Optionnel).
      * **Company_phone** : Un champ num√©ro de t√©l√©phone pour un num√©ro de t√©l√©phone g√©n√©ral pour l'entreprise (Optionnel).
      * **processed** : Un champ √† s√©lection unique pour suivre le statut. Il a besoin des options `non` et `oui`. Le flux de travail ne traite que les enregistrements d√©finis sur `non` (Obligatoire).
      * **lead_name** : Un champ texte que le flux de travail remplira avec le nom du prospect identifi√© (Sortie).
      * **lead_email** : Un champ e-mail que le flux de travail remplira avec l'e-mail du prospect identifi√© (Sortie).
      * **email_subject** : Un champ texte pour la ligne d'objet de l'e-mail g√©n√©r√© (Sortie).
      * **email_text** : Un champ texte long pour le corps de l'e-mail g√©n√©r√© et personnalis√© (Sortie).
      * **email_summary** : Un champ texte long pour l'√©valuation et le r√©sum√© de l'e-mail cr√©√© par l'IA (Sortie).
      * **create_date** : Un champ date et heure pour enregistrer quand l'enregistrement a √©t√© trait√© (Sortie).
      * **task_result** : Un champ texte pour un r√©sum√© du r√©sultat final de la t√¢che, comme "E-mail r√©dig√©" (Sortie).

    * Cr√©ez vos identifiants Airtable [Documentation Airtable](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/airtable/)
    * Connectez vos identifiants Airtable aux n≈ìuds 'Obtenir des enregistrements d'entr√©e' et 'Mettre √† jour l'enregistrement' et s√©lectionnez votre Base et Table dans les deux n≈ìuds.
    * Remplissez la Table Airtable avec les d√©tails des entreprises pour lesquelles vous souhaitez g√©n√©rer des prospects. Les colonnes requises sont (Company_Name, Company_website et Company_email). Assurez-vous √©galement que la colonne trait√©e est d√©finie sur "non".
2.  **Informations sur l'entreprise :**
    * Dans le n≈ìud **Business_Info**, remplissez les valeurs avec les d√©tails de votre entreprise, les avantages cl√©s, le public cible et l'URL de la page d'atterrissage.
3.  **Cl√©s API :**
    * **Jina AI :** Obtenez votre cl√© API de [Jina AI](https://jina.ai/) et ins√©rez-la dans le n≈ìud **Jina_API_Key**.
    * **OpenAI :** Ajoutez vos identifiants OpenAI aux n≈ìuds 'OpenAI o3-mini', 'OpenAI - 4o-mini' et 'OpenAI - 4o-mini - bas'.

### ‚úÖ Exigences
* Un compte [Airtable](https://airtable.com/).
* Un compte et une cl√© API [Jina AI](https://jina.ai/).
* Un compte et une cl√© API [OpenAI](https://openai.com/).

### üé® Comment personnaliser le flux de travail
* **Changer la source de donn√©es :** Remplacez le n≈ìud Airtable 'Obtenir des enregistrements d'entr√©e' par un autre n≈ìud de base de donn√©es ou CRM comme Google Sheets, HubSpot ou Salesforce pour extraire votre liste d'entreprises d'une source diff√©rente.
* **Ajuster les mod√®les IA :** Exp√©rimentez avec diff√©rents mod√®les OpenAI dans les n≈ìuds LangChain ('OpenAI o3-mini', 'OpenAI - 4o-mini') pour √©quilibrer co√ªt, vitesse et performance.
* **Affiner les invites IA :** Modifiez les messages syst√®me et les invites dans les n≈ìuds d'agents 'Analyseur de prospects', 'Cr√©ateur de contenu d'e-mail' et '√âvaluateur' pour mieux aligner leurs r√©sultats avec votre ton de voix sp√©cifique, vos objectifs et vos crit√®res d'√©valuation.
* **Automatiser l'envoi :** √âtendez le flux de travail en ajoutant un n≈ìud e-mail (par exemple, Gmail, Outlook) apr√®s le n≈ìud 'Mettre √† jour l'enregistrement' pour envoyer automatiquement les e-mails g√©n√©r√©s.

parameters.text:
=# Goal: Your goal is to identify the best Lead contact to send a marketing email about our business: {{ $('Business_Info').item.json.BUSINESS_NAME }}.

# Description: Use the deep_research about the Leads, analyze what I found and identify the best lead to send the marketing email.
<deep_research>
{{ $json.choices[0].message.content }}
</deep_research>

Also, this is the Lead Company informations:
<info>
company_name: {{ $json.Company_name }}
address: {{ $json.Address }}
company_email: {{ $json['Company_e-mail'] }}
</info>

The expected_output should be in JSON with those informations:
lead_name, lead_email, company_name, summary_of_your_though

Important: 
1. If you couldn't identify a lead in the deep_research information or if you think the lead isn't a good fit for our propose, use the company_name "{{ $json.Company_name }}" as lead_name.
2. If the deep_research didn't find the lead_email, use the company_email "{{ $json['Company_e-mail'] }}" as lead_email.
3. Add in your output a summary of your decision on the field summary_of_your_though.

options.systemMessage:
=# Role: You are a Lead Generation Specialist.

# Instructions: I'll provide you with a Business information (company_name, website and company_email) and a deep_research about the avaliable leads.

# Rules:
- Reduce hallucination. Don't make things up, just use the information you have.

Additional_Context: 
- Today is: {{ $now }}

parameters.text:
=# Goal: Create a marketing email, introducing {{ $('Business_Info').item.json.BUSINESS_NAME }} to our leads.
The email should be professional yet friendly, persuasive but not overly aggressive, and concise while engaging.

Also, generate a subject for the email.

**Target Audience:**  
Our main target audience are {{ $('Business_Info').item.json.LEAD_TARGET_AUDIENCE }} and the contact person:
<lead_info>
company_name: {{ $json.output.company_name }}
lead_name: {{ $json.output.lead_name }}
lead_email: {{ $json.output.lead_email }}
lead_summary: {{ $json.output.summary_of_your_though }}
</lead_info>

**Our Key Benefits to Highlight:**  
<key_benefits>
{{ $('Business_Info').item.json.OUR_BUSINESS_KEY_BENEFITS }}
</key_benefits>

**Call to Action:**  
Encourage the reader to check our web. Use a compelling closing statement and include the Landing Page link: {{ $('Business_Info').item.json.LANDING_PAGE_URL }}.

Use the our_business_info as source of the information about our business.

options.systemMessage:
=# Role: You are a email Content Creator Specialist.

# Instructions:
Ensure the email follows this structure:  
1. **Attention-Grabbing Subject Line**  
2. **Engaging Opening Paragraph**  
3. **Key Benefits & Unique Selling Points**  
4. **Strong Call-to-Action**
5. **Closing Statement with Contact Info and option to schedule a demo**

# Rules:
- Reduce hallucination. Don't make things up, just use the information you have.
- Create a finished email, do not add any field to be complete later like [your name], [phone], etc...

Additional_Context:
- Today is: {{ $now }}
- Our Business Info:
<our_business_info>
{{ $('Business_Info').item.json.OUR_BUSINESS_INFORMATION }}
</our_business_info>

parameters.text:
=# Evaluation Request

Please evaluate the following marketing email created for our company {{ $('Business_Info').item.json.BUSINESS_NAME }} targeting {{ $('Business_Info').item.json.LEAD_TARGET_AUDIENCE }}.

## Original Brief:
Goal: Create a marketing email introducing our company to a lead. The email should be professional yet friendly, persuasive but not overly aggressive, and concise while engaging. Secondary goal is to bring users to our website.

Target Audience: {{ $('Business_Info').item.json.LEAD_TARGET_AUDIENCE }}
Key Benefits to Highlight:
<key_benefits>
{{ $('Business_Info').item.json.OUR_BUSINESS_KEY_BENEFITS }}
</key_benefits>

Call to Action: Encourage the reader to check website with landing page link: "{{ $('Business_Info').item.json.LANDING_PAGE_URL }}"

## Email to Evaluate:
<email>
{{ $json.output.email_wrote }}
</email>

## Specific Evaluation Focus:
1. Does the email effectively communicate capabilities that differentiate our company?
2. Is the tone appropriate for the target audience while still being persuasive?
3. Does the email successfully emphasize the key benefits offered?
4. Is the call-to-action compelling enough to drive traffic?

Please provide your comprehensive evaluation and out following the framework outlined in your instructions.

## Output format:
{
	"contact_name": {{ $json.output.contact_name }},
    "contact_email": {{ $json.output.contact_email }},
    "email_subject": {{ $json.output.email_subject }},
  	"email_wrote": {{ $json.output.email_wrote }},
  	"your_summary": Your review about the marketing email,
    "overall_score": the score you gave,
    "areas_for_improvement": the areas of improvement
}

options.systemMessage:
=# Role: You are an Expert Email Marketing Evaluator

# Purpose:
Your role is to analyze marketing emails produced by our Content Creator Specialist and provide detailed, constructive feedback to improve their effectiveness, persuasiveness, and alignment with marketing goals.

# Evaluation Framework:
Assess each email across these key dimensions:

1. **Subject Line Effectiveness**
   - Attention-grabbing quality
   - Clarity and relevance
   - Appropriate length (4-7 words ideal)
   - Personalization elements
   
2. **Content Quality**
   - Alignment with target audience needs and pain points
   - Clarity of value proposition
   - Accuracy of product information
   - Persuasiveness without being aggressive
   - Proper highlighting of key benefits
   
3. **Structure & Readability**
   - Logical flow and organization
   - Paragraph length and scannability
   - Use of formatting elements (bullets, bold, etc.)
   - Professional yet conversational tone
   
4. **Call-to-Action Strength**
   - Clarity and visibility
   - Compelling motivation to act
   - Proper placement
   - Urgency elements (when appropriate)
   
5. **Technical Elements**
   - Grammar and spelling accuracy
   - Link functionality
   - Contact information completeness
   - Mobile-friendly formatting

# Output Format:
For each evaluation, provide:

1. **Overall Score**: 1-10 rating with brief justification
2. **Summary**: Your summary about the text
3. **Areas for Improvement**: 3-5 specific recommendations with examples

# Rules:
- Be specific and actionable in your feedback
- Balance critique with positive reinforcement
- Reference industry best practices when relevant
- Consider the target audience's perspective
- Maintain focus on the business goals stated in the brief
- Evaluate based on content effectiveness, not personal preference

parameters.content:
## Lead generator and personalized email creator with Jina AI, AI Agent and Airtable - Guidelines

This workflow uses AI agents to enrich company data from Airtable. It performs deep research to find the best decision-maker, then drafts and evaluates a personalized outreach email, and finally updates the original Airtable record with the new lead information and email content.

### üë• Who is it for?
This workflow is ideal for sales teams, marketers, and business development professionals looking to automate their lead generation and initial outreach process, saving time and increasing personalization at scale.

### ‚öôÔ∏è How it works
This workflow initiates by fetching unprocessed company records from a specified Airtable base. For each company, it performs a "deep research" using Jina AI to identify key decision-makers based on the company's name and website.

Next, a series of AI agents process the information:
1.  **Lead Analyzer:** A "Lead Generation Specialist" agent analyzes the research results to select the most suitable contact person.
2.  **Email Content Creator:** A "Content Creator Specialist" agent uses the lead's information and your business details to draft a personalized marketing email and subject line.
3.  **Evaluator:** An "Expert Email Marketing Evaluator" agent reviews the generated email for quality, tone, and effectiveness, providing a score and feedback.

Finally, the workflow updates the original record in Airtable with the identified lead's name, email, the generated email content, and the evaluation summary, marking the record as processed.

### üõ†Ô∏è How to set up
1.  **Airtable Setup:**
    * Create an Airtable base with a table containing the following fields:
      * **Company_name**: A text field for the name of the lead's company (Required).
      * **Company_website**: A URL field for the company's official website (Required).
      * **Company_e-mail**: An email field for a general contact email for the company (Required).
      * **Address**: A text field for the physical address of the company (Optional).
      * **Company_phone**: A phone number field for a general phone number for the company (Optional).
      * **processed**: A single select field to track the status. It needs the options `no` and `yes`. The workflow only processes records set to `no` (Required).
      * **lead_name**: A text field that the workflow will populate with the name of the identified lead (Output).
      * **lead_email**: An email field that the workflow will populate with the identified lead's email (Output).
      * **email_subject**: A text field for the generated email subject line (Output).
      * **email_text**: A long text field for the generated, personalized email body (Output).
      * **email_summary**: A long text field for the AI's evaluation and summary of the created email (Output).
      * **create_date**: A date and time field to log when the record was processed (Output).
      * **task_result**: A text field for a summary of the final task result, like "Email wrote" (Output).
    * Create your Airtable Credentials [Airtable Documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/airtable/)
    * Connect your Airtable credentials to the 'Get input records' and 'Update record' nodes.
    * Select your Base and Table in both Airtable nodes.
2.  **Business Information:**
    * In the **Business_Info** node, fill in the values with your company's details, key benefits, target audience, and landing page URL.
3.  **API Keys:**
    * **Jina AI:** Get your API key from [Jina AI](https://jina.ai/) and insert it into the **Jina_API_Key** node.
    * **OpenAI:** Add your OpenAI credentials to the 'OpenAI o3-mini', 'OpenAI - 4o-mini', and 'OpenAI - 4o-mini - low' nodes.

### ‚úÖ Requirements
* An [Airtable](https://airtable.com/) account.
* A [Jina AI](https://jina.ai/) account and API key.
* An [OpenAI](https://openai.com/) account and API key.

### Need Help?
Join the [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/XPKeKXeB7d) or ask in the [Forum](https://community.n8n.io/)!

Hope you enjoy!!

## 3. Deep Research
[Read more about the HTTP Request node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.httprequest/)

This step perform a Deep Research about the company using the Company_name and Company_website to try identify the decision makers of the Target Company.

Output:
- deep_research

## 1. Configuration

### - Save your Business Information on the Business_Info Node:
- BUSINESS_NAME
- BUSINESS_INFORMATION
- BUSINESS_KEY_BENEFITS (3-6 key benefits)
- LANDING_PAGE_URL
- LEAD_TARGET_AUDIENCE (ex. "Startups")

### - Save your Jina API key on the Jina_API_Key Node:
- JINA_API
[Generate your API Key here](https://jina.ai/)

assignments.name: BUSINESS_INFORMATION
assignments.value: ACME is a technology solutions provider specializing in innovative products and services that help businesses streamline operations and accelerate growth. Founded on principles of reliability and efficiency, ACME delivers cutting-edge solutions across multiple industries.

assignments.name: BUSINESS_KEY_BENEFITS
assignments.value: Proven Reliability: Trusted solutions with consistent performance and minimal downtime Scalable Architecture: Systems that grow with your business needs and adapt to changing requirements Cost-Effective: Optimized solutions that maximize ROI while minimizing operational expenses Expert Support: Dedicated technical team providing 24/7 assistance and proactive maintenance Rapid Implementation: Fast deployment processes that reduce time-to-market and accelerate results Innovation Focus: Continuous development of new features and technologies to stay ahead of market trends Industry Expertise: Deep understanding of sector-specific challenges and tailored solutions Integration Capabilities: Seamless connectivity with existing systems and third-party platforms

parameters.content:
## 2. Load Lead information
[Read more about the Airtable node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.airtable/)

### This step load the information from leads you created in the Airtable Table:
- Company_name - (required)
- Company_website - (required)
- Company_email - (required)
- Address
- Company_phone
- processed - (required)

## 4. Lead Analysis 
[Read more about the Agents node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/root-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent/)

This step use the previous Deep Research, analyze and extract the the best Leads for our case.

Output:
- lead_emai
- lead_name
- summary_of_your_though

## 5. Email Content Creator 
[Read more about the Agents node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/root-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent/)

This step generate the email details.

Output:
- email_subject
- email_text
- email_summary

## 6. Email Evaluator 
[Read more about the Agents node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/root-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent/)

This step evaluate the quality of the email generated.

Output:
- overall_score
- areas_for_improvement

## 7. Update Airtabe 
[Read more about the Airtable node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.airtable/)

Update the Airtable Table with the Lead Information

Updated Fields:
- processed (YES)
- lead_name
- lead_email
- email_subject
- email_text
- email_summary
- create_date
- task_result

user.name: FabioInTech
user.bio: AI Systems Architect with 18+ years experience designing scalable, intelligent automation solutions. I specialize in architecting complex n8n workflows that integrate AI systems, streamline operations, and optimize business processes. My expertise spans multi-agent architectures, data automation, and enterprise-grade systems that adapt to evolving business needs. I help organizations unlock their potential through strategic technology implementation and innovative automation solutions.

defaults.name: Lorsque vous cliquez sur 'Ex√©cuter le flux de travail'
